sentences.english: They never ignore any tatters, even an iron piece would bring them crazy joyous.
sentences.chinese: 破布烂衫不放过，碰上铁器喜如狂。

sentences.english: The period in which man learnt to make tools of iron is called the Iron Age.
sentences.chinese: 人类学会用铁制造工具的时代称为铁器时代。

sentences.english: These tools were found in an early Iron Age settlement.
sentences.chinese: 这些工具是在一个铁器时代初期的一个居住地发现的。

sentences.english: And he shall set engines of war and battering rams against thy walls, and shall destroy thy towers with his arms.
sentences.chinese: 支起破城机撞击你的城墙，用铁器击毁你的角楼。

sentences.english: Another red-hot iron quenched with wine, this wine notes the medicine.
sentences.chinese: 另以铁器烧红淬酒，将此酒调药服。

sentences.english: And he shall set engines of war against thy walls, and with his axes he shall break down thy towers.
sentences.chinese: 他必安设撞城锤攻破你的墙垣，用铁器拆毁你的城楼。

sentences.english: I know that the irony strikes with the force of a cartoon anvil, now.
sentences.chinese: 我现在知道那就象用一个卡通铁砧当作铁器用力敲打。

sentences.english: Can you tell me when was the Iron Age?
sentences.chinese: 能告诉我铁器时代是什么时候吗？

sentences.english: Marius heard a sound of charcoal being knocked with the tongs or some iron utensil, and Jondrette continued
sentences.chinese: 马吕斯听到一阵火钳或其他铁器和煤块相撞的声音。

sentences.english: To inhabit or hide in a den.
sentences.chinese: 模拟铁器时代穴居生活的洞穴。

sentences.english: He shall flee from weapons of iron, and shall fall upon a bow of brass.
sentences.chinese: 他逃避过铁器，铜矢必将他射穿。

sentences.english: Metallophones such as glockenspiels produce sounds in response to contact.
sentences.chinese: 钟琴等铁器在被碰触时会产生响应的声音。

sentences.english: While he flees from an iron weapon, the bronze bow strikes him down.
sentences.chinese: 他逃避过铁器，铜矢必将他射穿。

sentences.english: Iron came later, in what was called the Iron Age.
sentences.chinese: 铁后来出现，在所称的铁器时代。

definition: cloth and silk/cotton and silk textiles
